original_title: 美尻若妻×濃厚オヤジ　催淫マッサージでイカされて…
overview: Aika, who got married at a young age, was worried that it would end up being a family affair. Suggested by her husband to go to a beauty salon, she visits a newly opened shop. She is suddenly smeared with her lotion as she puts herself in the comfort of her kind counseling. She is soaked in her chaste black pantyhose, and her lower body emits a lascivious glow. Because her foolishness was filmed on video, she could not resist and she went to the beauty salon many times. The devil's hand of the old man who erodes even her home. Even though she should be really disgusted, she goes to the esthetic salon again.
title: A Young Wife with a Beautiful Ass x A Deep and Rich Dirty Old Man She Was Made to Cum with an Aphrodisiac Massage... Aika Yamagishi
